location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Chart showing Pearl Banks along Arabian Shore of the Persian Gulf, between Ras Tanura and Dabai'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 388 x 612mm, on sheet 447 x 687

mods.abstract: The map shows pearl banks found along the coastline of Arabia between Ras Tanura and Dubai, including Bahrain, Qatar, and Abu Thabi [Abu Dhabi]. The pearl banks are marked by a small circle and number (1-184) in red ink. The numbers correspond to a table that accompanies the map (folios 14-17) in which the name, degrees latitude, and degrees longitude are given for each pearl bank.The map includes a printing statement which reads 'No. 92 E., F. D.--Apl. 07--50.'
